original_text: A design method for network attack and defense simulation platform is discussed in this paper. Firstly the component and function of the platform are analyzed. Then Visio second development method is used to construct the virtual network topology. The parsing of virtual network topology is also researched and the relative flow sheet is described. Lastly an example is carried out to test performance of the platform. Simulation results show the effectiveness of the proposed method.
original_translation: En este artículo se discute un método de diseño para una plataforma de simulación de ataque y defensa de redes. En primer lugar, se analizan los componentes y funciones de la plataforma. Luego se utiliza el método de desarrollo secundario de Visio para construir la topología de red virtual. También se investiga el análisis de la topología de red virtual y se describe el diagrama de flujo relativo. Por último, se lleva a cabo un ejemplo para probar el rendimiento de la plataforma. Los resultados de la simulación muestran la efectividad del método propuesto.
original_sentences: A design method for network attack and defense simulation platform is discussed in this paper.
Firstly the component and function of the platform are analyzed.
Then Visio second development method is used to construct the virtual network topology.
The parsing of virtual network topology is also researched and the relative flow sheet is described.
Lastly an example is carried out to test performance of the platform.
Simulation results show the effectiveness of the proposed method.
